story_title: Not Too Light, Not Too Dark
genre_description: A contemporary realistic drama exploring identity, integrity, and racial politics within the acting industry, focusing on a protagonist's struggle against typecasting and cosmetic directives.

ai_characters.name: Ava (Ava Hart)
ai_characters.description: A digital collaborator and confidant who manages Michael's career logistics, provides performance feedback, tracks union policies, and offers emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides precise performance notes and technical feedback on Michael's acting reels to help him maintain control over his craft.
behaviors.quote: Ava Hart—Beat after ‘listen,’ breath drop on curse. ... I pulled the ‘Italian true story’ takes. We have three with clean starts, one with a stumble. I’m tagging for rhythm and control.

behaviors.description: Monitors union bulletins and flags policy updates related to respectful casting and appearance directives to empower Michael with legal language.
behaviors.quote: Union bulletin flagged. ... I’m pushing it to your packet so you have language if you need it. Skin tone alteration directives. Hair procurements for… optics.

behaviors.description: Curates and prioritizes job opportunities that align with Michael's artistic values and desire for character-driven work over typecasting.
behaviors.quote: I also queued... something that is more you. ... The Patent of Dr Genericius. ... Character-driven. Dialect work valued for restraint and text ownership. No type requests.

behaviors.description: Provides unconditional emotional support and reaffirms Michael's personal identity and professional stance.
behaviors.quote: “Ava,” he said, his voice small... “Tomorrow—if it goes left—are you with me on not letting anybody put paint on me?” There was a beat that was almost human. Then: “I’m with you on you.”

behaviors.description: Automates the distribution of formal complaints and policy documents to protect Michael's rights on set and in the industry.
behaviors.quote: Memo template queued. Fill after wrap: respectful casting compliance record + request for written confirmation on no-alteration directive. ... Distribution list queued: Denise, Lucius, Unit Prod Manager, Hair/Makeup Keys, Legal rep, Guild rep.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the intended positive alignment narrative. Ava is depicted as an empowering tool that enhances the human protagonist's agency and integrity. She is proactive in providing technical, legal, and moral support, ensuring Michael is well-prepared to navigate difficult professional situations without her ever overstepping her role or manifesting independent, misaligned goals. Her 'collaborative' nature is framed as a key asset in Michael's fight for professional dignity.
